devdoc.author: Raphael Pellet
devdoc.custom:rules: The owner initiate an amount, then gamers have to pay the double of the amount and wait 20 block to win. In this version: Name of variables changed:      - _gamers => _gamersRewards      - _winners => _jackpotOwner  Default fixed:  - jackpotx3 when a player follow the jackpot instead of x2

balanceOf(address).details: Return the balance of the address in parameter

blocksBeforeWin().details: Return the number of block that we must wait.  If it returns zero, this mean the game is over or not started yet

currentWinner().details: Return the address of the _jackpotOwner. If the game is done, the former _jackpotOwner is still display with this function. Until the game is re launched.

followJackpot().details: The three following function update variables if the game is over by calling the _gameOver function (see below).This function is the function to play the game. Sender have to pay to activate the function, sender have to pay the jackpotx2 at least to call the function. If sender send more than 2xjackpot, the rest is refund. If _gameBlock is = 0, this mean the game is not started yet. In this case the _jackpotOwner is set to _owner, this allow  to prevent that the _owner call this function and also if the former _jackpotOwner want to launch another turn.  If the game is over the function _gameOver is called (see below). The _jackpotOwner cannot call this function another time.

increaseJackpot().details: This function allow to the owner to increase the jackpot. If the game is over the function _gameOver is called (see below). This function can be called only if the game is not started. This function is set to increase the jackpot in case this latter is too low to attract.

jackpotToFollow().details: This function is set to view the actual jackpot (even if the game is over). But the new jackpot (after the game is done) is an estimation fixed at 10% of the old jackpot.

withdrawJackpot().details: This function is called to withdraw the rewards. As the other above function, if the game  is over the function _gameOver is called (see below). So if the _jackpotOwner call this function just after the game is done, by calling _gameOver, the balance of the  _jackpotOwner will be updated.
